draughts.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    part of the MODEL component in a MVC pattern for the draughts application.
    The Board is modelized as a two-dimensional array of squares, either active (playable) or inactive.

        Parameters:

        Gets the active square according to the label.
        Parameters:
